short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Reveal players VP in the popular puerto rico board game.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Puerto Rico Helper is a chrome extension plugin to help you keep track of other player's victory points, in the online version of the popular Puerto Rico boardgame, on boardgamearena.com.
